title: Dallas Mavericks star Luka Doncic avoids suspension after NBA rescinds 16th technical foul - ESPN
content: Dallas Mavericks star Luka Doncic avoids suspension after NBA rescinds 16th technical foul  ESPN
description: Luka Doncic will be eligible to play in Dallas' regular-season finale on Sunday after the NBA rescinded his 16th technical foul.
